The Famine Continues

\w There|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H7458"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, \w however|strong="H3588"\w*, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* region, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w was|strong="H7458"\w* \w so|strong="H3966"\w* \w severe|strong="H3515"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lands \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* exhausted \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.
